text: Agudas Israel may refer to: *Agudas Israel (Latvia), a political party in Latvia during the 1920s and 1930s *World Agudath Israel, the political arm of Ashkenazi Haredi Judaism *Agudat Yisrael, a political party representing the ultra-Orthodox population of Israel *Agudath Israel of America, a Haredi Jewish communal organization in the United States *Agudas Israel Housing Association, a British housing association
title: Agudas Israel
